    Truck QML Type

    A big car. More...

    Import Statement: import QmlNativeTypeSynopsis
    Since: Qt 6.8
    In C++: CppCar
    • List of all members, including inherited members

    Detailed Description

    Properties

    • color The color of the big car.

    Signals

    • engineStarted() Emitted when the big engine is started, along with more emissions than from a Car.

    Methods

    • startEngine() Starts the big engine.
